messages.subject: '05 conference
messages.msgSnippet: Ren-are you going to start a discussion list for the 05 conference?  Or will the 04 list just become the 05 list when Peabody is over?   That s a good
messages.messageBody:
"Ren-are you going to start a discussion list for the 05 conference? Or
will the 04 list just become the 05 list when Peabody is over? "

That's a good question. I'm staying in touch with Kathryn, so maybe we will just turn it over to an '05 discussion.
Another reason to attend this year's conference, is you might win a set of tickets to next years!!

Ren

Learn about unschooling at:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
